amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: None of the funds in this Act may be used for the Environmental Science Center, University of Dubuque, IA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for the Environmental Science Center, University of Dubuque, Iowa.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A041) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A041) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
